title: Zoodles with broccoli pesto

ingredients.content: 30 g Parmesan cheese, cut into pieces (3 cm)

preparations.content: Place all pesto ingredients into mixing bowl and blend <b>10 sec/speed 7<b> or until mixture forms a paste. Transfer into a large bowl and set aside. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place water into mixing bowl. Place Varoma dish into position and place zucchini and carrot into it. Secure Varoma lid and steam <b>8-10 min/Varoma/speed 1<b> or until just tender.
Set Varoma aside for 1-2 minutes and allow to drain, leaving Varoma lid on to keep warm. Transfer zoodles into bowl with pesto and toss gently to combine before serving.

hintsAndTricks: Use a spiraliser to create zoodles or peel vegetables into ribbons and slice ribbons into long lengths.
